Punch & Judy

Professor James Carney performs Punch & Judy with hand carved puppets in a booth made from coppiced hazel from the New Forest. The show is silly, funny and brutal, and the kids love it. If you would like to enquire about bookings email me.

Hand-carved puppets

Professor James Carney
